title: Copy Order
description: Duplicates the given order. The cloned order will always be in INCOMPLETE state. Payment groups and coupons/promotions, if any are associated with the order, are not copied. If an incomplete order exists already, it will be merged with the newly cloned order. Optionally takes X-CCOrganization header, which is a JSON field with the organization ID as the value. If this header is not provided, the endpoint considers the first active organization as the current organization for a B2B user

orderId.description: The ID of the order to be duplicated.

incompleteOrderId.description: The ID of the incomplete order to merge.

exclude.description: The properties to exclude when the order is copied. The key is the item descriptor name. The value is an array of the properties to exclude.

X-CCOrganization.description: Current organization context of the logged in user
